cs.AI, cs.HC, cs.LG, cs.CY, cs.CL

The paper discusses computational models of curiosity and their applications, which are relevant to several sub-categories in computer science. cs.AI is the most likely category as it deals with artificial intelligence and machine learning, which are discussed in the paper. cs.HC is also likely as the paper discusses the psychology of curiosity and its relation to human-computer interaction. cs.LG is relevant as the paper discusses machine learning frameworks and recommender systems. cs.CY is relevant as the paper discusses the impact of computational curiosity on cybersecurity. cs.CL is relevant as the paper discusses natural language processing and pedagogical agents.
